text: The rep I spoke with during a chat was great. Had to clean up something the previous rep I spoke to a few weeks ago didn’t handle. Issue was with making my membership payments from my Chase Account. Took forever to find out because my payments were declining and I don’t understand why as the money was always available.... it was switched to my Roar Account. Transferred money to that account to make Membership Payments and it declined again. I wanted to make all the payments to catch up and now the app is only letting me do one payment at a time every 5 days and that just sucks. I’ve been been trying to handle all of this for two (2) months and I just finally got some hope. It should give me option to pay all or pay one to reactivate. I know it’s hard times but I shouldn’t have to wait 5 days for very payment missed to catch it up. By time I’m done, two more payments will be due!!! I’m literally trying to pay you and you’re stopping me. The fact it takes 5 days to process and Credit Plus payment from a direct account with MoneyLion is weird to me. I understand outside banks. But I hope this can help change processing time etc
title: Credit Plus Membership Payment Issue

reply.message: We apologize to hear about your experience with MoneyLion. We would like to help resolve your concerns but are unable to locate your account to reach out to you. Please use the form linked below to fill out and we will contact you directly. https://moneylioncomplaints.zendesk.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

text: I love Money Lion! The only issue I have is with insta cash... PLEASE do away with allowing x amount of money out for a fee at a time!!! NOT COOL! If you give $100 as a limit... Let us take out $100 and not $45 at a time with a fee!!!

text: The services are only processed from a mobile app and in my case doesn't work on my galaxy s8.  I have been a customer for years and before this, their website experience was far superior because it just simply worked.  In the mobile app, I recieve errors or quirky issues that other apps don't display.  High risk/high reward is a very bad approach to mobile app design.

text: To get a loan you need to become a "member" which runs you $19.99, then you get your approved loan which is always about $500.  At a APR of 22.49% and 12 payments you will have paid an additional $240 in membership fees plus interest which is about $60. So in the end you are borrowing $500 for $300...  It's a scam and taking advantage of the most vulnerable all behind the geist of a "cool" looking app.  No different than walking into a payday loan center and being ripped off.  Ask a family or friend for the money and save your dignity.
title: Just dont even waste time....

reply.message: Credit Builder Plus is a powerful credit-building membership that includes a credit builder loan and more. For $19.99/month, you get access to a credit builder loan up to $1,000 at a competitive rate, monthly credit reporting and weekly credit score updates, 0% APR Instacash advances up to $50 per pay period, and Lion’s Share rewards of up to $19.99/month. There’s no credit check to apply, so it’s perfect for customers who have no credit or need to rebuild credit. Each person’s specific loan offer is based on their finances as detected in their securely linked bank account and other factors. We appreciate your feedback and if you have any other questions about our Credit Builder Plus membership, please feel free to contact us.

text: I filed a BBB complaint on July 27th. I took out the money lion credit builder loan in April, as of July 22nd I had it completely paid off. I contacted them that day, of course they tell me the payment is still processing and I have to wait 5 business days. So I do, I check the app everything is fully processed but no access to the escrow account. I called money lion 4 different times, each time getting disconnected except for the 4th. Finally get a representative and he tells me it has processed but the escrow (money I have paid to money lion) will not be accessed for another 5 business days. I paid $736 on Wednesday in hopes to pay my loan off and get the earned escrow. Now my account is negative they are not helping me get access to my funds and I’ve already been on the phone for 20+ minutes I get a representative first giving me one answer then a supervisor Shelby telling me a completely different response.  Fast forward to today, where it took 40 minutes to get a supervisor on the phone her name was Clarissa; who informed me I never spoke with Shelby and there are not any notes on the account. Still haven’t received escrow funds, they haven’t responded to BBB complaint NEVER GO THROUGH MONEY LION THEY ARE A SCAM
title: I filed a BBB complaint on July 27th

reply.message: We are reaching out to you to directly to resolve your concern! Thank you!!
